quote: Friends don't lie.
context: One of Eleven's first learned principles about friendship

quote: Mornings are for coffee and contemplation.
context: Hopper's trademark morning philosophy

quote: She's our friend and she's crazy!
context: Defending Eleven while also acknowledging her unpredictable powers

quote: Mouth-breather.
context: Eleven's go-to insult learned from Mike

quote: You can't spell America without Erica.
context: Erica making her patriotic entrance

quote: Ahoy ladies! Would you guys like to set sail on this ocean of flavor with me?
context: Steve's awkward Scoops Ahoy uniform greeting

quote: I dump your ass.
context: Eleven breaking up with Mike after learning from Max

quote: The gate. I opened it. I'm the monster.
context: Eleven blaming herself for opening the gate to the Upside Down

quote: How many children are you friends with?
context: Robin questioning Steve's unusual friend group

quote: I'm the one who gave you a life!
context: Hopper arguing with Eleven about keeping her hidden

quote: This is music!
context: Eddie before his epic guitar solo in the Upside Down

quote: Never change, Dustin Henderson.
context: Eddie's final words to his friend

quote: I didn't run away this time, right?
context: Eddie's last words after sacrificing himself

quote: Keep the door open three inches!
context: Hopper's protective house rule for Eleven

quote: Four puffs of the Farrah Fawcett spray.
context: Steve sharing his hair care secrets with Dustin

quote: Try before you deny, brochachos!
context: Argyle promoting pineapple pizza

quote: Turn around, look at what you see... In her face, the mirror of your dreams...
context: The NeverEnding Story duet during the Battle of Starcourt

quote: Easy peasy!
context: Bob's optimistic catchphrase before his sacrifice

quote: I will never stop looking for him!
context: Joyce's determination to find Will

quote: I say yes!
context: Hopper agreeing to adopt Eleven

quote: It's like I'm stuck. Stuck in the Upside Down.
context: Will describing his ongoing connection to the Upside Down

quote: What happened to Barb?
context: Nancy's guilt-driven quest for justice for her friend

quote: You're the most incredible person in the world.
context: Mike confessing his feelings to Eleven

quote: I am the reason for everything that's happened.
context: Vecna revealing he is the true evil behind all Upside Down attacks

quote: Running up that hill...
context: Max escaping Vecna's curse with Kate Bush's song

quote: Excellent!
context: Brenner's unsettling approval of Eleven's powers

quote: Chrissy, wake up! I don't like this!
context: Eddie's panicked plea when Chrissy is taken over by Vecna

quote: Something's coming. Something hungry for blood.
context: Lucas during the opening D&D campaign foreshadowing the Demogorgon

quote: Call me a conspiracist, I call myself a realist!
context: Murray defending his conspiracy theories

quote: Woody Woodpecker!
context: Alexei's joyful reaction to winning a stuffed animal

quote: Just be careful of the Demogorgon.
context: Dustin's warning during D&D, unaware of the real danger

quote: You should never have looked for me. Because now I see you. Now we can finally end this.
context: Vecna threatening Eleven

quote: I'm ten, chill!
context: Erica responding to Steve's concerns

quote: We're Max and Eleven. Super best friends.
context: Max bonding with Eleven

quote: Pretty... good.
context: Eleven learning to express herself

quote: Goodbye, Mike.
context: Eleven before sacrificing herself to defeat the Demogorgon

quote: I'll never let anything bad happen to you again.
context: Mike's promise to Eleven at the Snow Ball

quote: Do you really think I'm crazy?
context: Joyce seeking validation about the supernatural occurrences

quote: His name is D'Artagnan. Dart for short.
context: Dustin naming his 'pet' pollywog

quote: I made you.
context: Brenner's dark claim of ownership over Eleven

quote: You've come so far. I'm so proud of you.
context: Brenner's final words to Eleven

quote: I saw it. The thing that took me.
context: Billy breaking free from the Mind Flayer's control

quote: Code Red!
context: Emergency signal for the group

quote: Planck's constant!
context: Suzie providing the numeric code to close the gate

quote: This pain... it is a gift.
context: Vecna speaking to Max about trauma and pain

quote: Never Tell Me The Odds!
context: Dustin quoting Han Solo

quote: I'm not afraid of you. I'm not afraid of anything anymore.
context: Max confronting Vecna

quote: Purple Palm Tree Delight.
context: Argyle's name for his special marijuana strain

quote: I am Dungeon Master!
context: Eddie's commanding presence in Hellfire Club

quote: Breathe... Sunflower... Three to the right, four to the left... Rainbow... 450...
context: Terry's cryptic message about her memories of Eleven

quote: Science is neat, but I'm afraid it's not very forgiving.
context: Mr. Clarke's lesson about the risks of experimentation

quote: A flea and an acrobat. You see, the flea can travel in either direction, but the acrobat can only walk along his rope.
context: Mr. Clarke explaining dimensions to Mike, Dustin, and Lucas

quote: You shouldn't like things because people tell you you're supposed to.
context: Jonathan's advice to Will about individuality

quote: There is a demon in this town!
context: Jason rallying the town against Eddie Munson

quote: I have a wound. And it's been festering. And the only way I'm going to make it better is by finding the man who did it.
context: Kali explaining her quest for revenge against Brenner

quote: There are certain laws of physics that can simply not be broken.
context: Mr. Clarke explaining interdimensional travel

quote: You have a wound. A wound that can't be healed.
context: Kali speaking to Eleven about their shared trauma

quote: In Russia, you don't find deal. Deal finds you!
context: Yuri's colorful sales pitch

quote: Peanut butter! Smooth, not crunchy!
context: Yuri's bribe demands

quote: We need to neutralize the threat.
context: Sullivan's cold determination to eliminate Eleven

quote: We're the good guys now.
context: Dr. Owens differentiating himself from Brenner

quote: You want to stop Brenner? Let's stop Brenner.
context: Nancy committing to exposing the truth about Hawkins Lab

quote: It's like I'm stuck in the Dark Place.
context: Will describing his terrifying visions

quote: Music... it saved me.
context: Victor revealing how he survived Vecna's attack

quote: I saw things. Horrible things.
context: Victor describing his family's encounter with Vecna

quote: You are the key to everything.
context: Vecna revealing Eleven's importance to his plans

quote: I want to finish what we started. I want to kill it.
context: Nancy's determination to destroy the Demogorgon

quote: This is not a normal time, right? I'm not saying it's supernatural, but I'm not saying it's natural either.
context: Joyce trying to explain the strange events

quote: What are you, stupid? Just run!
context: Bob's last words before being attacked by Demodogs

quote: You rule, you know that?
context: Robin expressing her appreciation for Steve

quote: We're not going to Mirkwood on some...blind faith mission!
context: Lucas being skeptical about searching for Will

quote: I've seen the way you look at her. And I'm telling you now, that girl's been through hell.
context: Hopper warning Mike about his relationship with Eleven

quote: Looks like you've got yourself some competition.
context: Billy challenging Steve's status

quote: Henderson! What are you doing?
context: Steve discovering Dustin's situation

quote: Just the facts.
context: Erica being pragmatic

quote: I'm his girlfriend. His celestial girlfriend.
context: Suzie describing her relationship with Dustin

quote: No more secrets, okay?
context: Hopper promising Eleven transparency

quote: You still don't understand, do you?
context: Vecna revealing the truth about his past

quote: It is over, Eleven. You have freed me.
context: Vecna after Max's death opens the gates

quote: I thought you were supposed to be some kind of super spy.
context: Max teasing Dustin

quote: I know my boy!
context: Joyce defending her belief that Will is alive

quote: Curiosity is the gateway to understanding.
context: Mr. Clarke encouraging scientific curiosity

quote: We never would've upset you if we knew you had superpowers.
context: Mike apologizing to Eleven

quote: He's here.
context: Will sensing the Mind Flayer's presence

quote: I can make people see, or not see, whatever I choose.
context: Kali demonstrating her powers to Eleven

quote: Respect and responsibility.
context: Neil lecturing Billy

quote: This is crazy!
context: Mike reacting to supernatural events

quote: Sometimes I feel like I'm still there.
context: Will describing his PTSD from the Upside Down

quote: Trust is a dangerous thing in this place.
context: Enzo warning Hopper about the prison

quote: Everyone has something they want to protect.
context: Enzo explaining his motivations

quote: That's just crazy talk, broski.
context: Argyle's laid-back dismissal

quote: You're Jim Hopper. The American!
context: Enzo recognizing Hopper in the prison

quote: I love her, and I love you.
context: Bob expressing his love for Joyce and Will

quote: I'm just going to walk away now.
context: Robin's awkward exit

quote: You're different now.
context: Barb noticing Nancy's change

quote: Just because you don't see us doesn't mean that we're not there.
context: Steve's rallying speech

quote: Will is alive! I don't know where he is, but I know he is out there!
context: Joyce's unwavering belief

quote: This isn't you.
context: Barb warning Nancy about Steve

quote: I felt it everywhere.
context: Will describing the Mind Flayer's influence

quote: I can save them.
context: Eleven's determination to save her friends
